snippet: The French government says it is not behind accusations against Nicolas Sarkozy, but critics say such claims ring hollow in a country where political battles are virulent.
abstract: Memo from France; French Pres Francois Hollande, Socialist and longtime political foe of former French president Nicolas Sarkozy, is buffeted by record-low approval ratings, sluggish economy and infighting among his party ranks; Sarkozy and his supporters argue that French government is behind corruption allegations, since Sarkozy is favorite among conservatives to challenge Hollande for presidency in 2017.

byline.original: By DAN BILEFSKY and MAÏA de la BAUME

lead_paragraph: The French government says it is not behind accusations against Nicolas Sarkozy, but critics say such claims ring hollow in a country where political battles are virulent.

headline.main: Sarkozy, Plagued by Accusations, Sees Left-Wing Plot to Destroy Him
headline.print_headline: Sarkozy, Plagued by Accusations, Sees Left-Wing Plot to Destroy Him
